name: mindfulfocus
description: Mindful Focus desktop app with Electron + React + SQLite
author: NeuroGO

scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron . --no-sandbox --disable-dev-shm-usage" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.clean-dev: rimraf dist && rimraf frontend/dist && npm run dev
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.rebuild: rimraf dist && rimraf frontend/dist && npm run build
